page.title: 13SHOPPING 04160531
page.content: This rural D-block consists of 2 small villages & 2 medium-sized ones.Most of the shops are General Dealers selling a wide range of everyday goods.For other goods, such as furniture,clothes & medicines, people have to go by bus or car to towns such as Bishop Auckland or Crook.There are 4 different shops in{HUNWICK,}2 General Dealers at opposite ends of the village, a Post Office & a Newsagent's.Even the Post Office & Newsagents sell things like sweets & cigarettes.In {HOWDEN}all of the shops are in the village centre.There is 1 General Dealer,a butcher's,a DIY shop,a dress shop,a fish&chip shop,a hairdresser's & a Post Office which sells groceries too.There are no shops at all in {NORTH BITCHBURN}but in { {HIGH GRANGE}there is a Post Office which sells all kinds of general goods
